406260.name: Robotpencil Presents: Approachable Anatomy
406260.description:
Topics Covered:

-Gesture
-Basic Anatomy Sense
-Application through poses
-A demonstration on how you can apply it all to one drawing

Comes with all the PSD's attached to the video tutorial.

There will be more in-depth tutorials for each specific piece of information as time passes. Thanks for the support.
406260.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
